title-group.article-title: It's a Wonderful Life: A Case in Financial Institutions Management and History

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2005 Journal of Financial Education, Jean L. Heck

abstract.p: The popular holiday movie. It's a Wonderful Life, provides a useful in-class case that illustrates var√≠ous topics in financial institutions history and management. We discuss our use of the film and provide questions and notes corresponding to relevant sequences in the film that stimulate classroom discussion and student thought. Students respond positively to the fihn in terms of its usefidness and appropriateness.
